name: LORE CARD 005: Betsy
description:
A fisherman’s daughter on the colony, with an older brother Gabe, Betsy is somewhat overshadowed at home.  Life in the colony is a struggle to survive but she is luckier than most. As the owner of the last remaining fishing mech on the docks, her father finds himself under a great deal of pressure to support the many livelihoods that depend on him. 

Betsy sees the struggles of others and works hard to help those around her as best she can.  She can be impulsive and her temper runs hot, but she tries to do what she thinks is right.

Betsy will face her own misfortune and need to make a snap decision, one that will set her fate into motion.
